The colors in this are bright! It’s not a pastel just in case anyone thought it would be light in color. But love it and get lots of compliments on it. Took a while to come.

This is a really cute reversible vest! I was timid to purchase at first because there were no other reviews and it also said that based on my sizing I buy on Amazon that a large would fit best (even though I usually always purchase a small). So, I bought a large thinking they run big or something and when it came in the mail (took a couple weeks), it was too big so I ordered a small and that one fits great.  When I went to start a return for the large vest, I was sent a return label but it was mostly written in Asian characters and UPS could not finish out the return.  I ended up calling Amazon and they were able to refund me since it wasn’t my fault the return was not able to be scanned.  So, all that to say, it’s a super cute vest (just purchase your normal size) but the return process from the USA won’t work unless the seller fixes it on their end.
I ordered this for some back to school teacher looks and I’ve never gotten so many compliments. I love this and such a cute way to dress up while being a bit cooler.
This is adorable! I love the fit, it’s a little longer than most vests which is a plus for me. I like that you can wear it reversible too.
